home.title: Home
home.content: Prepare for exams with Examify Prep. Start your future here. Modern solution for specialized education. Unified platform for Teachers, Students and Administrators. Interactive tests, Personal success statistics, Error analysis, Weekly ratings. Automatic checking, Group management, Methodological resources. Real Time Analysis, Secure System, Flexibility. Created Tests, Active Students, Qualified Teachers.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Have questions? Contact us. Send a message: Your Name, Email, Phone. Select subject: Technical Support, Billing Issues, New Feature Suggestion, Partnership. Phone: +998 90 123 45 67, Email: info@examify.uz. Address: Tashkent, Sergeli district. My messages section.

login.title: Login
login.content: Examify Prep - Enter details to login to your profile. ID or Email, Password. Continue as a teacher, student, or admin. Logging into system, Loading data.

welcome.title: Welcome / Onboarding
welcome.content: Step into the world of Examify Prep. Dynamic Island navigation, Saving system (Storage), Message center (Messages), AI assistant (Examify AI), Personal profile. Track your achievements.

adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
adminDashboard.content: Statistics, user management, creating classes and tests. Special features for admins. Full control over the activities of the Study Center.

adminTeachers.title: Teachers
adminTeachers.content: Add new teachers, edit information, delete. Monitor teachers' activity and ratings.

adminStudents.title: Students
adminStudents.content: Divide students into groups, view exam results, check attendance.

teacherClasses.title: My Classes
teacherClasses.content: Teachers can manage their classes, assign tasks to students, and monitor their progress.

teacherTests.title: Test Management
teacherTests.content: Create new tests, form a question bank, set test duration and evaluation criteria.

studentTests.title: Tests
studentTests.content: Take tests by subject. Test your knowledge. Get test results immediately.

studentResults.title: Results
studentResults.content: Results of all previous tests, work on mistakes, progress dynamics.

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: Name, surname, photo, and personal settings. Account security, password change, language settings.

aiHelp.title: AI Assistant
aiHelp.content: Get quick answers to your questions. Test analysis and study plan creation via AI. Chat communication.
